scripts.bench: TIMESTAMP=$(date +%Y%m%d_%H%M%S) && npx lighthouse http://localhost:8788 --chrome-flags='--headless --no-sandbox' --only-categories=performance,accessibility,best-practices,seo --output=json,html --output-path=./benchmarks/lighthouse/$TIMESTAMP && npm run bench:format && npm run bench:html
scripts.bench:format: zsh -c 'LATEST=$(ls benchmarks/lighthouse/ | grep .json | tail -1) && HTML=$(ls benchmarks/lighthouse/ | grep .html | head -1) && JSON_FILE=benchmarks/lighthouse/$LATEST && echo "‚úÖ Results saved to benchmarks/lighthouse" && echo "üìä Performance: $(jq .categories.performance.score $JSON_FILE)" && echo "‚ôø Accessibility: $(jq .categories.accessibility.score $JSON_FILE)" && echo "üîß Best Practices: $(jq ".categories[\"best-practices\"].score" $JSON_FILE)" && echo "üîç SEO: $(jq .categories.seo.score $JSON_FILE)" && echo "üìÅ View HTML: chromium benchmarks/lighthouse/$HTML"'
scripts.bench:html: zsh -c 'LATEST=$(ls benchmarks/lighthouse/ | grep .html | tail -1) && chromium benchmarks/lighthouse/$LATEST'
